fetch.command: pkg="gpe-todo" date="20100107" release="2.8+" # The release should be of the form major.minor-debianversion or major.minor+debianversion. # The latter form means that the "svn$date" form of package version should be used debver=${release#*-} if [ "$debver" = "$release" ] ; then debver=${release#*+} ; fi if [ "$debver" = "" ] ; then debver="1" ; fi majmin=${release%-*} ; version="$majmin+maemo-$debver" if [ "$majmin" = "$release" ] ; then majmin=${release%+*} ; version="${majmin}+maemo+svn$date-$debver" ; fi pkgdir="$pkg-$version" branch="svn://projects.linuxtogo.org/svn/gpe/trunk/base" svn export -r {${date}T0000Z} $branch/$pkg $pkgdir mv -f $pkgdir/debian/changelog $pkgdir/debian/changelog.tmp echo "$pkg ($version) unstable; urgency=low" >$pkgdir/debian/changelog echo >>$pkgdir/debian/changelog echo " * MUD build using revision {$date}" >>$pkgdir/debian/changelog echo >>$pkgdir/debian/changelog echo " -- Graham Cobb <g+770@cobb.uk.net> $(date --rfc-2822)" >>$pkgdir/debian/changelog cat $pkgdir/debian/changelog.tmp >>$pkgdir/debian/changelog rm -f $pkgdir/debian/changelog.tmp

deb.description: GPE PIM suite todo lists applications\nIncludes categories, and partial completion states.\nPackaged with MUD
deb.build-depends: debhelper (>= 4.0.0), libtododb-dev, libgpepimc-dev, libgpewidget-dev, intltool, libhildon1-dev, libhildonfm2-dev, libosso-dev
deb.upgrade-description:
Updated beta of GPE PIM suite todo list manager
Changes include:
- Category changes automatically updated (bug 80)
- Fixed "Open..." menu item (bug 205)
"Show completed" state is saved
- Added delete menu item (bug 249)
- Translation updates
- Change name to GPE To-do list and update menu items and icons
- GPE Summary shows abandonned todos
- Remember category between sessions (bug 261)
- Improved Fremantle UI support
- Fix crash when creating new item with non-English locale
